body.name: 2 Pack Wireless Microphone for iPhone iPad, Mini Wireless Clip-on Microphones for iPhone Video Recording, YouTube, Interview, TikTok, Vlog
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 21 mins
features: Universal wireless system: EJCC dual wireless microphone completely free from the shackles of the wire, allowing you to complete dynamic shooting, cell phone recording, short video production in a variety of large scenes. Clip-on microphone, lavalier microphone for iphone, you can simply clip the microphone on your clothes to free your hands and record at a distance. Wireless microphone, 65 feet of stable audio signal transmission without cables.

Rechargeable transmitter and receiver: The EJCC wireless lavalier microphone has a built-in 65MAH rechargeable battery with up to 5 hours of run time, two means 10 hours. Charging time is only 2 hours. While using the lavalier microphone, you can charge your device at the same time. Mini microphone, compatible with Lightning (iPhone/iPad) devices only, no USB C-type port to connect to your phone, Bluetooth microphone not available for Android devices unless you have a proper adapter.

Easy auto-connect: EJCC wireless microphone is easier to set up. Plug and play, lavalier microphone, no adapter, Bluetooth or app required. For recording microphone, iphone wireless microphone simply plug the receiver into your device (lighting port) and turn on the portable microphone and the two parts will pair automatically. (Note: Bluetooth wireless microphone, if the match is not successful, do not worry, just turn off the device and try again).

Omnidirectional sound reception: omnidirectional wireless microphone has a built-in intelligent active noise reduction chip, ipad microphone provides effective original sound recognition and clear recording in noisy environments. Clip-on microphone with built-in sponge windshield to reduce wind noise and clutter, and AI algorithm's intelligent noise reduction module can accurately filter various noises with strong anti-interference capability.

Applications: This innovative dual wireless lavalier microphone is compatible with IOS smartphones, iPad, etc. The handheld microphone is suitable for blogging, interviewing, live streaming, blogging, podcasting, YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, online video tutorials and singing recording. Ideal for bloggers, journalists, Mukbang, fitness instructors, teachers and office workers. Bluetooth microphone for Apple phones, the clip-on microphone is very lightweight and easy to carry.,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 different lavaliere mic sets hoping that at least one would be good. I've had bad luck with mics in the past. One sounded super crackly, but this one sounded GREAT! It's super easy to use. Just plug in and get started. Really like these for creating YouTube content. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great microphones!
reviews.reviewText: These microphones have been so fun to use for amateur projects. Sometimes they are used to goof off with friends with fake podcasts or interviews and other times I use this as a microphone for presentation on zoom or to pre record audio for projects at school. I really love these mics and work well for what I used them for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I love these microphones. I use them to record client review videos and to do voiceovers for home tours (I’m a realtor).They really help make your voice more clear and decrease background noise.They charge quickly and hold a charge well.They are small, unobtrusive and easy to operate and attach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works really well
reviews.reviewText: Only thing I don’t like is the cushions are very thin and loose. Lost the cushion on the first day of use unfortunately. Still works without it so no big deal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love EASY Technology
reviews.reviewText: These wireless microphones were the simplest to use and connect to my iphone. The sound quality is great. I can now record, hear and understand what I'm saying. If you like easy technology, these are the microphones for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great
reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised. They are great for simple recordings with my iPhone. Significantly improves the overall sound quality and cancels out background noise I picked up with the phone internal microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm impressed with the quality of this mic! It's very easy to use!I need to clear something up though! Soooo many people are complaining & sending this product back saying it's defective because the charging cord that comes in the box doesn't fit the adapter that goes into the phone. They are correct, it doesn't fit, HOWEVER, the cord that came in the box is to charge the mics! You are supposed to use your NORMAL PHONE CHARGER to go into that port on the adapter... I almost fell into the same trap as everyone else but thought about it, tried my normal charger and WHA-LA! Do not make the same mistake as everyone else, bashing this product & company due to USER ERROR.All in all, great product! I'm excited I finally have mini microphones! LOL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not good for vloggin
reviews.reviewText: I bought it because I started a youtube vlog and seeing the price decided that it could be good to start the channel, but my voice kept breaking up, sometimes its really loud and muffled and somethings you cant hear a thing, it is very easy to use but dont recomend.
